name: Dungeon Operatives (Sir Froth)
description:
A 3d First person shooter that needs to be played an Xbox controller or any  Xinput device.

Controls:

Left Joystick to move

Right Joystick move camera

Start is enable 2 players

RT to shoot

X is to reload

LT is to ADS

D-pad is used for voices

Use Alt + f4 to quit game
